The government needs to reform the justice system, ensuring murderers are not allowed freedom at holidays to see their family, whilst another family is without their father.

Murderers showing no remorse must NOT be given manslaughter charges, pleading guilty or not, but should serve life.

Prisons should be tougher, remove all privileges and go back to two meals a day of bread and water, sustain the prison population through minimising costs, by taking away what the prisoners are given.

Prisoners should be allowed no visitors within the first 25% of their sentence, to ensure they have more time thinking about what they have done.

Any decisions on any appeals should be made only by the victims families, as only they can reflect the suffering that has been caused.

Justice should be harder on those whose actions effect others for longer, murderers, and rapists should serve at least double what they currently do.

The justice system is laughable, and needs to be changed.
